mapper.select: select u_id as username, password, name, phone, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialsNonExpired, isEnabled, from user where 1=1 and u_id = #{username}
select u_auth from u_auth where 1=1 and u_id = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( u_id, password, name, isAccountNonExpired, isAccountNonLocked, isCredentialsNonExpired, isEnabled ) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{isAccountNonExpired}, #{isAccountNonLocked}, #{isCredentialsNonExpired}, #{isEnabled} )
